channel.title: On Science!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "On Science!"

item.title: Re: On Science!
item.content:encoded: Oh, I want some of this. Those arena prizes are niceâ€¦ but whenever I enter the Arena, no one's there. Okay, sure, I'm on at weird times, but I want to smack some people around too!

item.title: Re: On Science!
item.content:encoded: yeah, I know I sat in the arena for a good 2 hours and only fought like 1 random person that just so happened to stumble in there. :(

item.title: Re: On Science!
item.content:encoded: @Omnifox: I thought that I saw someone mention it somewhere but nothing come from that. I'm hoping that Uzuki or now Jupiah(Long live the Second WikiKage) will in -Village Announcement - inform of preferred time for arena fights.

item.title: Re: On Science!
item.content:encoded: Contribute it through the party house and through contracts. The party house probably returns more per amount spent there than anything else.

item.title: Re: On Science!
item.content:encoded:
ok thx cuz I hunt everyday but have never seen any of these ingreds.

I'll contribute as much ryo as I can.

item.title: Re: On Science!
item.content:encoded: That does include the potion items you need bankai to brew.

item.title: Re: On Science!
item.content:encoded:
Are you serious?!?

That was my idea. My whole reasoning behind getting the clock in the first place.

Anyway, great Uzuki does that include the potion items you need bankai to brew?

item.title: Re: On Science!
item.content:encoded:
I would like to propose a Arena time of "BvS Server Time" for a Wiki to have fights and collect points :). Any other nin for outside village is welcomed. More opponents means more fights more chances to get points.

If there is interest for that, Uzuki give 2 daily Arena Fights Times of BvS Server Time so anyone can clear picture.

It's connected with "On Science" subject by Trail Mix prize. :P

item.title: Re: On Science!
item.content:encoded:
I'm all for that.

That means that we have to start collecting points for "Trail Mix" from arena shop to get to hunts for higher success of getting sham rock and more ingredients.

item.title: On Science!
item.content:encoded: After today, any day where we pull in more than 100k ryo in a single day, we're going to invest in our Science! machine (25k investment in that day). This will make it possible for us to collect rare ingredients for potions and for you guys to get Sham Rocks to unlock the St. Flash quest line (which gives you guys a phenomenal theme).
